content.rendered:
Thousands Have Trusted Me To Grow Their Portfolios.

My company and I help empower your financial journey through personalized portfolio management with proven solutions designed for long-term success.

Get Started
Learn More

My Services:

Investment Advisory

Retirement Planning

Tax Optimization

Portfolio Management

About Me

Get To Know Alex Ballard

Trusted Financial Advisor

Alex Ballard has been a dedicated financial advisor for the better parts of 17 years now.  Experienced in helping individuals and families grow and protect their wealth.

With a deep industry insight and a client-first approach, she’s worked with top financial institutions, earning multiple certifications.

Alex Ballard is passionate about crafting personalized strategies that bring confidence, clarity, and measurable results to every financial journey.

Learn More
Investment Planning
Strategies & Skills 95%
Retirement Planning
Strategies & Skills 85%
Tax Optimization
Strategies & Skills 90%
Contact Me
Learn More

Your Trusted and Reliable Investment Advisor and Broker

Alex Ballard is passionate about Coaching Traders and passive investors on the nuances, mental outlook, and principles that professional traders use daily to generate massive trading profits!

Alex Ballard is registered with MERILL LYNCH, PIERCE, FENNER & SMITH INCORPORATED, and started her career in finance in 2021. Alex Ballard has worked at 1 firm and has passed the Series 63, Series 7TO and SIE exams.

I’m committed to your success and the enhancement of your life. With a wealth of experience and a deep understanding of your unique aspirations, I will work to help you achieve your financial goals and live your best life. It all begins with a meaningful conversation centered around your dreams and aspirations. Together, we’ll chart a path to financial prosperity tailored specifically to you!

With Alex Ballard...

When you work with Alex Ballard, she would provide comprehensive services that cover all aspects of your investments—from consulting and investment management to trade execution.

By focusing on the needs and challenges of clients, Alex Ballard ensure that every transaction is transparent and free from mistakes or regrets.

With a team of highly qualified professionals, delivering excellence in every investment, guaranteeing clients’ peace of mind and guaranteed returns.

We don’t stop with financial freedom. That is a worthy goal on its own, but we believe that freedom and prosperity make for the happiest lives and best retirements.

Together, we can help you to make sound financial decisions that will grow and preserve your wealth so that you can leave a legacy to last for generations. Your children and grandchildren can enjoy a better lifestyle…forever!

What's My Mission?

To partner with clients in long-term, trusted relationships, always putting their best interests above my own. To inspire my clients to achieve financial peace of mind through my experience, communication, and service, which exceeds their expectations and gives clients the freedom to pursue their finances.

What's My Vision?

My vision is to be your most trusted advisor through my professional knowledge, our integrity, and our personalized service.

My Core Values

Integrity

Upholding the highest standards of honesty and transparency in all dealings.

Responsibility

Being accountable for our actions and the outcomes of our services.

Excellence

Striving for the highest quality in every service we provide.

Reliability

Ensuring our clients can depend on us for accurate and timely services.

Human-Centered Approach

Putting our clients’ needs and interests at the heart of everything we do.

Empathy

Understanding and addressing the unique challenges faced by our clients.

Some Stats

Over the years

Proven Financial Expertise

With a deep understanding of financial markets and regulations, I provide tailored solutions to help you navigate complex financial landscapes.

97.64%

Investment Success Rate

17

Years of Experience

7,983

Individual Portfolios Managed

55 States Licenses

1 FINRA Registrations

Reach out to me now
Learn More

Broker Qualifications

Certified

Work Experiences

Reach out to me now

EDWARD JONES (CRD#:250)

Since 2/20/2019

6+ yrs

EDWARD JONES (CRD#:250)

Since 6/7/2001

24+ yrs

MERILL LYNCH, PIERCE, FENNER & SMITH INCORPORATED.

One Bryant Park New York, NY 10036 United States
Registered with this firm since 12/20/2021
Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith Incorporated (often called Merrill) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Bank of America. It operates as a registered broker-dealer and investment adviser, providing wealth management, brokerage, and financial planning services to individuals and institutions.

Exams & Licenses

Verified and licensed in 52 states

I have passed 0 principal/Supervisory exams, 2 General Industry/Product Exams, and 2 State Securities Law Exams.

📘 Exam 🏷️ Category 📅 Date
👨‍💼 Principal/Supervisory Exams
⚠️ No information reported.
📊 General Industry/Product Exams
🎓 Securities Industry Essentials Examination SIE 10/01/2018
🎓 General Securities Representative Examination Series 7 06/05/2001
🛡️ State Securities Law Exams
📜 Uniform Investment Adviser Law Examination Series 65 05/06/2025
📜 Uniform Securities Agent State Law Examination Series 63 03/07/2022
Learn More

My 4 Pillars of Trading Success

Becoming a trader can’t be improvised. It takes a lot of time, hard work and money to lose. The cycle to becoming a winner in your trading takes several years. Winning on one or more trades is something everyone can do, but winning in the long run is the real challenge

1. Strategic Planning
2. Risk management
3. Trading Psychology
4. Analysis & Execution

Professional traders have different strategies to win the market. A trading strategy is your preferences while trading the market or instrument, such as how frequently and how long or short-term to trade.

In my view, this is the most important element. You may have the best strategy in the world, but if you can’t minimise your risk of losing your positions, you could end up losing most of your trading capital before you hit a profit.

Psychology in trading is managing your emotions. These emotions depend on your personality and especially on your relationship with money. This component is very difficult to tame for the simple reason that you need discipline to manage your emotions..

Measuring the echoes, refining strategies, and ensuring continued resonance, results won’t come without executing my strategies on your portfolio.

1. Strategic Planning

Professional traders have different strategies to win the market. A trading strategy is your preferences while trading the market or instrument, such as how frequently and how long or short-term to trade.

2. Risk management

In my view, this is the most important element. You may have the best strategy in the world, but if you can’t minimize your risk of losing your positions, you could end up losing most of your trading capital befor you hit a profit.

3. Trading Psychology

Psychology in trading is managing your emotions. These emotions depend on your personality and especially on your relationship with money. This component is very difficult to tame for the simple reason that you need decipline to manage your emotions..

4. Analysis & Execution

Measuring the echoes, refining strategies, and ensuring continued resonance, results won’t come without executing my strategies on your portfolio.

My Trading Methods

My processes are simple and effective, her process spans through three stages which makes it transparent and worry-free.

Look Down Before You Look Up

All great traders determine what they are willing to lose before they think about what they will earn on a trade. Decide before your enter a trade where you will exit.

Remember your opinion doesn't matter only the markets moves!

Let the market determine what direction its going to move in and not your feeling! Discipled traders respond intelligently and wisely to price action.

Trade your personality, account size & style!

Identity your ideal timeframe, trade size and financial goals. Avoid being influenced by trading profit generated by other Traders. Trading is an individual performance business, and profitable traders trade their accounts without being swayed by FOMO.

Frequently asked question

I know you have a question. I’ve answered some frequently asked questions here. Feel free to ask me anything.

Ask me a question
How will I gain from your expertise?

My team and I set out to empower millions of people across the globe by upgrading them to a more open, efficient, and inclusive financial system, to do that, we built a platform to enable us trade and make good profit for our clients, which fulfils their financial need.

Who can benefit from your trading guidance and mentorship?

My trainings and guidance are valuable for both novice investors and seasoned professional traders.

How can I get in touch with you?

Talk to me by email, alexballard378@gmail.com

Can your methods really impact my investing success?

Absolutely, my methods and guides can make a tangible difference in your investment journey, driving success and growth.

Hear from My Clients

My Clients have amazing things to say…

Lisa R McKinney
Accountant

“Trading with Alex Ballard is refreshing, bringing unique insights and empathetic guidance that exceeded my expectations.”

Robert Lee
Small Business Owner

“Alex Ballard’s coaching and methods are a game-changer. Her deep market insights and strategic guidance have helped and transformed my portfolio earnings. A big Thanks to her!”

Maria Rodriguez
Consultant

“Working with Alex Ballard has been a great decision. Their customer service is exceptional, and they truly go above and beyond to ensure their clients are happy. The property I purchased is exactly as advertised, and the entire transaction was smooth and secure. I highly recommend Alex Ballard for all your investment needs.”

Leon B Lewis
Statistical Assistant

“Under Alex Ballard’s coaching, I experienced remarkable positive shifts through her deep understanding and strategic approach.”

Emily Davis
Freelance Writer

“She has proven to be a reliable and trustworthy partner. Her attention to detail, transparency, and commitment to delivering on their promises set them apart in the industry. I’m thrilled with my investment and look forward to working with them on future investments.”

Sarah Johnson
Marketing Manager

Alex Ballard exceeded my expectations in delivering top-notch investment returns. The process of choosing the right option to invest was seamless, and she guided me every step of the way. Her integrity and commitment to customer satisfaction are commendable. I’m confident in my investment, thanks to your expertise.

Russell I Granderson
Security Guard

“Most mentors don’t even create enough time to follow up on their mentees but she is the real definition of a Mentor. She’s always there to guide her mentees and make sure they’re on the right path. She puts you on the money game, changes your mentality, and guides you through the right path. Ever since our paths crossed and I took her courses, she absolutely changed my mentality and my financial life. Her favorite quote “Go hard or Go harder” always pops up in my head when I feel like giving up, and then I go even harder.”

Olivia Martinez
Entrepreneur

Anyone looking to take control of their finances should invest with Alex Ballard.

Brenda C Sun
Magnetic Resonance Imaging Technologist

I had an excellent experience with Alex Ballard. Her team was professional, transparent, and very responsive throughout the entire process. From selecting the perfect investment to handling all the paperwork, they made everything easy and stress-free. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to invest.
